data.text:
@Bigsmiffy438 @JHowardBrainMD @drlucymcbride When the numbers for recent flu deaths are so low as to be unworkable, there's nothing else to do though aside from use data from other years.
Unless you think those low numbers are telling you something... but nah; that's crazy! https://t.co/S9KUbAPHW6

@Loretta_Torrago @JHowardBrainMD @drlucymcbride And that’s not the only problem

She uses IFR and doesn’t include transmission rate 
Comparing Covid deaths to pre Covid flu deaths is nonsensical. Because Covid measures vastly lower rate of flu transmission 

Compare flu deaths to Covid deaths in the time frame of Covid.

@Loretta_Torrago @tothesea7 She is a piece of fucking work. 
She is getting everything she wants, everything she has been misleading about for over a year, and STILL is lying to make her point.
How American - bitch and bitch and complain.... Then get what you want 
and  bitch & lie some more!

@Loretta_Torrago And, aside from any arguments about exact numbers, I think the big takeaway is:
https://t.co/BfZWCFXmBu

@TheStephP @tothesea7 The conversation in the replies is hilarious. Jeremy Faust calls McBride out and she blames Hoeg (it's her "data") but McBride tells Faust to DM her. Lol, why should he DM her if it's Hoeg's data? This crew ....

@zoonotic1 Jeremy Faust gave McBride a thrashing in the replies & Hoeg came in to defend her "data." Yes, absolutely - they are acting as if the numbers are willfully recalcitrant instead of thinking: What are the numbers telling us? So much for "data." Lol, this is so bad. https://t.co/3KH5vpYMkc
@ForlornTheresa @drlucymcbride @IndignantIsaiah The hero who puts that together 💕

@HickieMd @justthefacts85 @drlucymcbride Poke around McBride's replies to the graph. I'm blocked but Jeremy Faust called them out and Hoeg came on to defend herself by pretending those willfully recalcitrant recent flu numbers are too low to calculate so we have to use other years. Hmmm... seems like a set-up to me. https://t.co/JrH9wdYceq

@gorskon @justthefacts85 @drlucymcbride As much as I prefer giving people the presumption of innocence, it takes so many machinations to get the numbers they do, it's hard to believe they just "stumbled" on them.
